description.@en: Your god despises cowardice, making you its champion in passing judgement upon the weak.

data.distance: Any one person you can see

criticalFailure.@en: Your dictum goes unnoticed by the Winter King. You have brought great shame upon yourself and must pay the price. You suffer 9 Corruption!

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they also begin their Turns with 1 less AP for the Duration of the spell.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, providing they are considered to be dishonorable or have Chaos Ranks higher than their Order Ranks, the person suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage now and at the beginning of their subsequent Turns for the Duration of the spell.

reagents.@en: A castle-forged axe, leveled at your enemy
